overview:
Miss Laura Saravia is art director for Time Warner in New York by day and VP of STAGE 84 in Florida by night. As the art director with previous experience ranging from sports and corporate to accessories and publishing, this hands-on designer turned a bland four cube workstation to an award winning design studio.

Utilizing her design, marketing and intuition, she along with her family, started a small live music, art and cafe lounge in the emerging Davie/ W Hollywood, FL entertainment hub of Pine Ridge Plaza.

The rest remains to be seen as she is delves deeper in volunteerism and non-profit work.
